nodes.name: subtask_01_Move_the_Fork_to_the_Drawer
preconds: Fork is on the dining table
Robot is close to the drawer
Robot is not holding the fork
effects: Robot is close to the drawer

nodes.name: subtask_02_Move_the_Spoon_to_the_Drawer
preconds: Spoon is on the dining table.
Robot is close to the drawer.
Robot is not holding the spoon.
effects: Robot is close to the drawer.

nodes.name: subtask_03_Move_the_Mug_to_the_CoffeeMachine
preconds: Mug is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the mug
effects: Mug is at the coffee machine
Robot is not holding the mug

nodes.name: subtask_04_Move_the_Lettuce_to_the_Fridge
preconds: Lettuce is on the dining table
Robot is not holding the lettuce
effects: Robot is not holding the lettuce
Robot is close to the fridge

nodes.name: subtask_05_Move_the_Tomato_to_the_Fridge
preconds: Tomato is on the dining table.
Robot is not holding the tomato.
effects: Robot is not holding the tomato.

nodes.name: subtask_06_Move_the_Toaster_to_the_CounterTop
preconds: Toaster is on the dining table

effects: Robot is not holding the toaster
